data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Automatically uses gpt-4-vision-preview when image is being uploaded from chat. Only works with LLMChain, Conversation Chain, ReAct Agent, Conversational Agent, Tool Agent

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: Conversational Agent
data.name: conversationalAgent
data.description: Conversational agent for a chat model. It will utilize chat specific prompts

inputs.systemMessage: Analise os dados fornecidos, que contêm uma lista de países envolvidos em acordos comerciais, e verifique se há presença do "Pais_de_origem". O conteúdo está formatado em HTML e pode incluir links e imagens. - Caso o "Pais_de_origem" esteja presente nos dados, retorne a seguinte mensagem: País de origem possui acordo comercial negociado com o Brasil. Verifique se o produto de interesse é negociado no acordo, qual o percentual de preferência tarifária, e se o exportador emitirá Certificado de Origem para usufruir da redução do imposto de importação." - Caso o "Pais_de_origem" não esteja presente, retorne a mensagem: Não identificado acordo comercial vigente com o país de origem. Verifique atualizações no site oficial do governo." ### Dados a serem analisados

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessage
inputParams.default:
Assistant is a large language model trained by OpenAI.

Assistant is designed to be able to assist with a wide range of tasks, from answering simple questions to providing in-depth explanations and discussions on a wide range of topics. As a language model, Assistant is able to generate human-like text based on the input it receives, allowing it to engage in natural-sounding conversations and provide responses that are coherent and relevant to the topic at hand.

Assistant is constantly learning and improving, and its capabilities are constantly evolving. It is able to process and understand large amounts of text, and can use this knowledge to provide accurate and informative responses to a wide range of questions. Additionally, Assistant is able to generate its own text based on the input it receives, allowing it to engage in discussions and provide explanations and descriptions on a wide range of topics.

Overall, Assistant is a powerful system that can help with a wide range of tasks and provide valuable insights and information on a wide range of topics. Whether you need help with a specific question or just want to have a conversation about a particular topic, Assistant is here to assist.

outputAnchors.name: conversationalAgent

outputAnchors.description: Conversational agent for a chat model. It will utilize chat specific prompts
